overview: Story Journalist, Laly is with her boyfriend in the Far East to do a photo essay. But it is above all a man that she is photographing, an Italian who seems to be a kingpin in the mafia. She follows him everywhere and will even end up starting a friendship with him...But is Laly really the journalist that she pretends to be? Filmed on location in the Cambodian Jungle, in Bangkok and in Italia, this film takes you on a thrilling adventure where the sex marks the rest of the warrior in group scenes with strong sodomies and double penetration. And of course the occasion to see Laly, still more beautiful and more exciting than ever.
title: Bangkok Connection
